Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientstates

Class AbstractClientState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientstates.AbstractClientState
Direct Known Subclasses:
EndState, GameState, InputState, LobbyState, LoginState, RoomState
public abstract class AbstractClientState
extends java.lang.Object
A clientConnector state is meant to handle interactions between the user and the server All the clientConnector logic should be implemented here
